name: Sisi - Sex, Adult couple game
description:
Sisi is an erotic game that touches on piquant themes. Love and sex are the basis of the game.

ONLINE GAME

On-line you will find a partner. It can be from any part of the world, and also you can play with a close person, you just need to start the search at the same time. Improved mode introduces greater involvement, and communication in private chat is emancipation.

GAME FOR PAIR

If you have your parter next to you, you can play on one device. Customize the game to your taste, you can find a wide variety of categories.
In turn, with your favorite you need to perform tasks. You can refuse to perform, then you will be punished.

MINI GAMES

• Cubes - 21 combinations of categories! It's incredible. You can customize both dice for your taste.
• The wheel is perfect for a party. Contains gay phantoms.

STORIES

A selection of stories, assessing stories from real users.

CHAT

In a chat room you can chat on any topic, if you want private messages, then play the online mode.

ATTENTION

The game does not contain a guide to action, use only for entertainment purposes.
You must be at least 18 years old to download the game and start playing.
